english.segment1: The new moon is climbing. Over the horizon. Chasing the day away
english.segment2: Seems like I've been waiting. All my life just to take in. One glimpse, one view. With these eyes, and I knew

english.segment4: You came and shook me. When I thought I would be. On my own, alone
english.segment5: And now all this sadness. We'll leave it behind us. It's all so clear. We can start right here
